known_issues: 'Chapters read/chapters available' output currently does not display decimal values even though the value can be stored.

existing_features.title: In `frontend/src/components/manga/MangaCard.tsx`, move the title-cycle ArrowRight icon down by 5px from its current position (i.e., reduce the current upward Y-translation by 5px) while keeping the rest of the gutter layout behavior unchanged.
In `frontend/src/components/manga/MangaCard.tsx`, change the title-cycle ArrowRight icon color from green to a dark brown color.

Fix the "chapters read/chapters available" display so it correctly renders decimal values (e.g., `104.5/200.0` should display `104.5/200` or `104.5/200.0`, but must not truncate to `104/200`). This includes auditing `frontend/src/components/manga/MangaCard.tsx` and `frontend/src/utils/formatChapterNumber.ts` to ensure no rounding/truncation occurs in the displayed output.

new_feature_requests.summary: Move the arrow down by 5 pixels
Change the arrow color from green to dark brown
Fix 'chapters read/chapters available' display to support decimal values (e.g., 104.5)

projectName: Adjust MangaCard title-cycle arrow position/color and fix chapter progress decimal display
